publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2376 Ms Margo MacDonald: Use of Cannabis-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to establish a commission of experts and lay persons to examine and report on the social and medical factors affecting the use of cannabis, following the recent announcement by the Home Secretary regarding reclassification of the drug.
S1M-2376 Use of Cannabis (lodged on 29 October 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2376 Use of Cannabis (lodged on 29 October 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-2376 Use of Cannabis (lodged on 29 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2376 Use of Cannabis (lodged on 29 October 2001) Robin Harper*
S1M-2376 Use of Cannabis (lodged on 29 October 2001) Dennis Canavan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2376 Use of Cannabis (lodged on 29 October 2001) Nora Radcliffe*
